page.title: 04ROXWELL PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The church in Roxwell Village is over 650 years old.The church has 40 pews and 10 crosses in it.Also the church has bells.The church at Roxwell has a list of all the people who died in Roxwell it also has memos of those who died printed on the wall and floor usually in brass.It is a large church and has a screen seperating the altar from the seating area.The church has around 83 graves surrounding it,dating from a very long time ago.One of the memorials is to Maria Helot.There are lots of windows in the the church to let in the light,most of the windows are made of stained glass.The entrance is surrounded by flowers to improve its appearance.The church had a timber framed roof.
